show_name: The Asterisk War: The Academy City on the Water (TV 2)
other_title: 学戦都市アスタリスク (Japanese)
plot: Upon Rikka, the academy-city above water, or what many call the “Asterisk,” students of the six schools prepare for the Festa. These annual comprehensive battle tournaments are held on a worldwide scale and each of the six schools place their hopes in their teams to bring them victory. In the Phoenix Festa (tag-team battle) category, Seidoukan Academy's Ayato Amagiri takes up the challenge along with his partner Julis, the Witch of the Resplendent Flames (Glühen Rose).
ending_theme: "Ai no Uta -words of love-" by Haruka Chisuga
insert_song: "Hold you in the wind" by Rasmus Faber feat. Emily McEwan (ep 24)
